events.name: Li-ion battery industry expansion
events.wd_description: The Li-ion battery industry is expected to grow tenfold in the next 5-10 years, necessitating a similar expansion in the supply chain.
events.description: The Li-ion battery industry is expected to grow tenfold in the next 5-10 years, necessitating a similar expansion in the supply chain.

events.name: Cobalt supply constraints
events.wd_description: The majority of cobalt is mined as a byproduct of copper or iron ore in the Democratic Republic of Congo, making its supply inflexible and dependent on the demand for these primary minerals.
events.description: The majority of cobalt is mined as a byproduct of copper or iron ore in the Democratic Republic of Congo, making its supply inflexible and dependent on the demand for these primary minerals.

events.name: Congo mining operations
events.wd_description: Cobalt is primarily mined in the Democratic Republic of Congo, often in conjunction with copper and iron ore extraction.
events.description: Cobalt is primarily mined in the Democratic Republic of Congo, often in conjunction with copper and iron ore extraction.

events.name: Copper demand
events.wd_description: The demand for copper directly influences the rate of cobalt extraction due to their co-occurrence in mining operations.
events.description: The demand for copper directly influences the rate of cobalt extraction due to their co-occurrence in mining operations.

events.name: Metals market reaction
events.wd_description: The price of elemental cobalt has more than doubled in the last 12 months, driven by anticipated demand from the battery industry.
events.description: The price of elemental cobalt has more than doubled in the last 12 months, driven by anticipated demand from the battery industry.

events.name: Cobalt pricing
events.wd_description: The significant increase in cobalt prices reflects the anticipated demand for cobalt in battery production.
events.description: The significant increase in cobalt prices reflects the anticipated demand for cobalt in battery production.

events.name: Battery industry demand
events.wd_description: The expected growth of the battery industry is driving up demand for cobalt, influencing its market price.
events.description: The expected growth of the battery industry is driving up demand for cobalt, influencing its market price.
